# makeSharedEvent(handle:)

**Instance Method**

Recreates a shared event from a handle.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeSharedEvent(handle sharedEventHandle: MTLSharedEventHandle) -> (any MTLSharedEvent)?
```

## Parameters

- **sharedEventHandle**: An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLSharedEventHandle] instance from another GPU device or process.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLSharedEvent] instance if the method completed successfully; otherwise nil.

## Creating fences and events

- **makeFence()**: Creates a new memory fence instance.
- **makeEvent()**: Creates a new event instance that you can use to synchronize commands and resources within the same GPU device.
- **makeSharedEvent()**: Creates a new shared event instance that you can use to synchronize commands and resources across different GPU devices.
